index.title: Sora.QL ‚Äî Simple and Fast GraphQL API for Anime
index.description: Free and powerful GraphQL API for anime with multi-language support and high performance.

primary_title.title: Sora.QL - Simple and Fast GraphQL API for Anime
primary_title.description: All information about anime, characters, and episodes in one convenient API. Easy integration, powerful features, and multi-language support ‚Äî Sora.QL provides unlimited access to data!

feature_1.name: GraphQL Flexibility
feature_1.description: Get only the data you need, minimizing load and optimizing API performance.

feature_2.name: MyAnimeList.net
feature_2.description: All anime data from MyAnimeList.com ‚Äî the best source for anime in the world!

overview.title: Sora-QL: Convenience and Flexibility for Your Anime App
overview.description: Sora-QL (Á©∫) ‚Äî a powerful tool for anime app developers, allowing quick integration of anime data through GraphQL, using information from MyAnimeList. Easy setup and high scalability make it a great choice for your project.
overview.no-commerce: We are a non-commercial project. Our goal is to provide open and free access to anime data for all users, as well as give developers the ability to integrate this data into their projects without commercial profit. We are community-focused and aim to make the world of anime more accessible.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.description: Learn how Sora-QL fetches, processes, and caches anime data using Redis, MySQL, MongoDB, and the MyAnimeList API.

details.step_1: The user sends a request to Sora-graphql to fetch anime data.
details.step_2: The GraphQL API first checks if the requested data is in the cache. If data is found, it is immediately returned to the user.
details.step_3: If data is not in the cache, Sora-graphql sends a request to Sora-parser. If data is found in the cache or in Sora-parser databases, it is passed to Sora-graphql and then sent to the user.
details.step_4: If data is not found in the cache or in MySQL/MongoDB, the GraphQL API sends a request to the MyAnimeList API.
details.step_5: The fetched data undergoes machine translation, formatting, and structuring by Sora-parser.
details.step_6: After processing, the data is saved in MySQL/MongoDB (for static data, such as genre lists or studios) and in Redis (for fast access).
details.step_7: After all checks and processing, Sora-parser sends the data to the GraphQL API, which saves it in its cache and sends it to the user.

graphql.save_data: Saving data to database and cache

features.title: Advantages of Using SORA.QL API
features.description: Using the SORA.QL API provides many benefits, such as...

feature_1.name: GraphQL Flexibility ‚ö°

feature_2.name: Data from MyAnimeList üìö

feature_4.description: The API is available for free, just submit a request. üìù See for yourself its capabilities and start integration without financial investment! You can also use a test API key, which is available below.

feature_5.name: Up-to-date Data üîÑ
feature_5.description: Data is synchronized directly with the MyAnimeList API and cached for quick access. üì° You always get up-to-date information about new releases, ratings, and changes in the anime industry without worrying about delays!

feature_6.name: Creating Anime Apps for the World üåç
feature_6.description: By using our API, you can create anime apps available to viewers worldwide! üì± With MyAnimeList.com, we provide full access to data about titles, characters, and episodes, so you can easily build multilingual apps and services that will be popular with global audiences. üåê

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.subtitle: Anidzen Ecosystems ‚Äî A team creating innovative solutions for the anime community.
about_us.mission: We believe that anime should be accessible to everyone in their native language. Our mission is to make anime convenient and accessible for all, regardless of country or language. We create tools that help developers and enthusiasts integrate anime into their projects, allowing them to easily build their own anime apps.
about_us.values: We strive for quality, honesty, and convenience. We believe that free access to anime will unite people worldwide. Sora.QL is a non-commercial GraphQL API providing anime content integration without restrictions.

showcase.description: These amazing projects leverage the power of the Sora.QL API to provide you with the best anime experience.
